types.html:
en suspens

  1. dangling, in mid-air
  2. (figuratively) pending, outstanding, on hold, in abeyance (awaiting a conclusion or a confirmation, not settled or finished)
    rester en suspens ― to remain pending
    être en suspens ― to be on hold
    laisser en suspens ― to leave open
trans: pending, outstanding, on hold, in abeyance

title: en suspens
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɑ̃ sys.pɑ̃/
